name: Shifted (Cosmo Myzrail Gorynych)
description:
Shifted is a relaxing jigsaw puzzle

Enjoy dozens of full-HD puzzles in three levels of complexity flavored with nice ambient music.

Features
  • Ultra-casual, calming experience.
  • Hand-picked, high-quality images from Unsplash.
  • 3 levels of difficulty.
  • Tracking of your progress and stats.
  • 4 distinct categories to choose.
  • Partial mobile support.
New categories and expansions coming SOON.

Works best with itch.io app.

Created by CoMiGo with their marvellous ct.js game engine.

Music by Jukedeck. Create your own here.

Another calming game from me:
